content:
Thank you for noticing! I'm glad to have been able to help and chat with you about indie games, but I understand that the conversation has gotten quite long.

Let's start fresh with a new conversation! I'd be happy to continue discussing indie games, Hyper Light Drifter, or any other gaming-related topics you'd like to explore. Just feel free to start a new question or topic, and I'll do my best to assist you.

(And don't worry, I won't mind if you want to keep the conversation going; I'm here to help and chat about games!)
